title: Constructivist-Based Teacher Coaching Design and Continuous Education Improvement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic instructional design and coaching principles
context.additional_context: Coaching skill acquisition and educational improvement competency enhancement for office/administrative professionals using a constructivist approach

learning_goals: Learners will apply a coaching goal-setting framework based on constructivist principles to propose three realistic educational improvement goals.
Learners will derive at least five criteria for evaluating the achievability of coaching goals by analyzing learner data.
Learners will develop a continuous educational improvement plan incorporating peer feedback and present it using project-based assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
